trans-unit.source: Serializes and deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, in SOAP format.
trans-unit.target: Serializes og deserializes et objekt eller en hele diagrammet av koblede objektene i SOAP-format.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Beginning with the .NET Framework 2.0, this class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Som begynner med .NET Framework 2.0, denne klassen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> instead.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>i stedet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The SoapFormatter and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> classes implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> interface to support remote procedure calls (RPCs), and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> interface (inherited by the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>) to support serialization of a graph of objects.
trans-unit.target: SoapFormatter og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>klasser Implementer den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>grensesnittet for å støtte eksterne prosedyrekall (RPCer), og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>grensesnittet (arvet av den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>) til å støtte serialisering av et diagram av objekter.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The SoapFormatter class also supports RPCs with <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> objects, without using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> functionality.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SoapFormatter støtter også RPCer med <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>objekter, uten å bruke den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>

trans-unit.source: During RPCs, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> interface allows the specification of two separate object graphs: the graph of objects to serialize, and an additional graph that contains an array of header objects that convey information about the remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature).
trans-unit.target: Under RPCer, den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>grensesnittet gjør det mulig to atskilte objektet diagrammer: diagrammet skal serialisere og en ekstra Diagramalternativer som inneholder en matrise av hodet objekter som formidler informasjon om eksterne funksjonskallet (for eksempel transaksjons-ID eller en metodesignatur).</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>

trans-unit.source: For proper serialization, the root object of the first graph must be an object that implements either the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface or the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: For riktig serialisering roten første diagrammet må være et objekt som implementerer enten den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>grensesnittet eller <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization of an RPC, a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler> delegate is specified to the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method of the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Under deserialisering av en RPC en <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>representant er angitt til den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter.Deserialize%2A>-metoden til formateringen.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>

trans-unit.source: The remoting infrastructure uses the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler> delegate to produce an object that supports the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ekstern kommunikasjon-infrastruktur bruker den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>representant for å lage et objekt som støtter det <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>

trans-unit.source: This object contains the information stored in the headers, and becomes the root of the graph returned by the deserializer.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet inneholder informasjonen som lagres i hodene, og blir roten av diagrammet ble returnert av deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: The SoapFormatter can also handle RPCs that are produced with objects that implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: SoapFormatter kan også håndtere RPCer som produseres med objekter som implementerer den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>

trans-unit.source: To create an RPC without using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> functionality, place an object that supports the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> interface at the root of a graph being serialized.
trans-unit.target: Til å opprette en RPC uten å bruke den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>funksjonalitet, sted et objekt som støtter det <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>grensesnittet på roten av et diagram som serialiseres.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>

trans-unit.source: To deserialize an RPC created in this manner the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A> property must be set to another object that supports the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> interface, and contains the relevant remote call information.
trans-unit.target: Deserialisering av en RPC opprettet på denne måten den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A>egenskapen må være angitt til et annet objekt som støtter det <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>grensesnittet og inneholder informasjon om relevante eksterne kall.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: TimeSpan Serialization TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.
trans-unit.target: Tidsområdet serialisering tidsområdet objekter er serialisert i henhold til ISO 8601:1998 delen 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.

trans-unit.source: Version Information The SoapFormatter does not support serialization compatibility between versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Versjonen informasjon for SoapFormatter støtter ikke serialisering kompatibilitet mellom versjoner av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Serialization between versions 1.1 and 2.0 types in the Framework often fails.
trans-unit.target: Serialisering mellom versjon 1.1 og 2.0 typer i Framework ofte mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: The following actions can be taken to remedy this issue: - Convert to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>, which provides compatibility between 1.1 and 2.0.
trans-unit.target: Følgende handlinger kan utføres for å løse dette problemet:-Convert til å bruke den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>, som gir kompatibilitet mellom 1.1 og 2.0.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: - Convert existing persisted data to the new format.
trans-unit.target: -Konvertere eksisterende faste data til det nye formatet.

trans-unit.source: - Convert all producers and consumers of serialized data to version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: -Konvertere alle produsenter og forbrukere serialiserte data til versjon 2.0.

trans-unit.source: - Avoid using types that changed from 1.1 to 2.0.
trans-unit.target: -Unngå å bruke typene som er endret fra 1.1 til 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref> class with default property values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref> klasse standard egenskapsverdier.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.SurrogateSelector%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context%2A>|A new <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> initialized to specify that the serialized data can be transmitted to or received from any of the other contexts|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.SurrogateSelector%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context%2A>| En ny <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>initialisert for å angi at de serialiserte dataene kan overføres til eller mottas fra noen andre kontekster |</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.SurrogateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Objects are serialized to, or deserialized from, the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Objekter er serialisert til eller deserialiseres fra den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The serialization or deserialization process uses the specified <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector> to search for surrogates that are registered for the object types you want to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Serialisering eller deserialisering prosessen bruker den angitte <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>du søker etter Surrogater som er registrert for objekttyper du ønsker å deserialisere.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Surrogates are helpers that serialize and deserialize objects of specific classes.
trans-unit.target: Surrogater er hjelpere som serialisere og deserialisere objekter av bestemte klasser.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector> cannot handle the serialization of objects that derive from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> for remoting purposes.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>kan ikke håndtere serialisering av objekter som er avledet fra den <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>ekstern kommunikasjon formålene.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>

trans-unit.source: In a remoting situation the specified <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector> replaces the object derived from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> with a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> object that is serialized by the specified surrogate selector.
trans-unit.target: I en ekstern kommunikasjon situasjon som er angitt <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>erstatter objektet som er avledet fra <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>med en <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>objekt som er serialisert av angitte erstatning velgeren.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> </xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you want to use remote objects, set the `selector` parameter to an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor Hvis du vil bruke eksterne objekter, angi den `selector` parameter til en forekomst av <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>

trans-unit.source: If you do not need surrogates, set the `selector` parameter to be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke trenger surrogater, angi den `selector` parameteren skal `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"></xref> to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"> </xref> skal brukes med den nye forekomsten av <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that holds the source and destination of the serialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder kilde og mål for serialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: If the `context` parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, then the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context*> defaults to <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `context` parameteren er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, vil <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context*>som standard <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the behavior of the deserializer with regards to finding and loading assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir virkemåten til deserialisering med hensyn til å finne og laste inn samlinger.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle"></xref> values that specifies the deserializer behavior.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle"> </xref> verdier som angir virkemåten deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"></xref> that controls the binding of a serialized object to a type.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"> </xref> som styrer bindingen for et serialisert objekt til en type.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"></xref> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"></xref> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>brukes med denne <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> provides an enumeration that describes the source and the destination for a given serialized stream, as well as a way for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>gir en opplisting som beskriver kilden og målet for en gitt serialisert dataflyt, i tillegg til en metode for serialisering å beholde den konteksten og en ekstra oppkaller brukerdefinert kontekst.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>brukes med denne <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the data on the provided stream and reconstitutes the graph of objects.
trans-unit.target: Deserializes data på den angitte dataflyten og reconstitutes diagrammet av objekter.

trans-unit.source: For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering i dataflyten for vellykket deserialisering må være i begynnelsen av objekt-diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Kalle denne metoden med uklarerte data er en sikkerhetsrisiko.

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden bare med klarert data.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [uklarerte Data sikkerhetsrisiko](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the data to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som inneholder dataene deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: The top object of the deserialized graph (root).
trans-unit.target: Øverste objektet av deserialisert diagrammet (rot).

trans-unit.source: serializationStream is .
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamis .

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the stream into an object graph with any headers in that stream being handled by the given <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Deserializes dataflyten i diagrammet et objekt med en topptekst i denne dataflyten håndtert av den angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Headers are used only for specific remoting applications.
trans-unit.target: Overskrifter brukes bare for bestemte ekstern kommunikasjon programmer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler> parameter is one of two ways to return headers from a stream in SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC) format.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>parameteren er én av to måter å returnere overskrifter fra en dataflyt i SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC)-format.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>

trans-unit.source: The other way is to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den andre er å bruke den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering i dataflyten for vellykket deserialisering må være i begynnelsen av objekt-diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: TimeSpan Serialization TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.
trans-unit.target: Tidsområdet serialisering tidsområdet objekter er serialisert i henhold til ISO 8601:1998 delen 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Kalle denne metoden med uklarerte data er en sikkerhetsrisiko.

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden bare med klarert data.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [uklarerte Data sikkerhetsrisiko](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the data to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som inneholder dataene deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: Delegate to handle any headers found on the stream.
trans-unit.target: Representanten skal håndtere hoder funnet på dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The top object of the deserialized graph (root).
trans-unit.target: Øverste objektet av deserialisert diagrammet (rot).

trans-unit.source: serializationStream is .
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamis .

trans-unit.source: serializationStream supports seeking, and its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamstøtter søking og lengden er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"></xref> of automatic deserialization for .NET Framework remoting.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"> </xref> for automatisk deserialisering for .NET Framework ekstern kommunikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Supported values are <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel> (the default).
trans-unit.target: Verdier som støttes <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel>og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel>(standard).</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel>

trans-unit.source: For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Remoting](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om deserialisering nivåer, kan du se [automatisk deserialisering i .NET ekstern kommunikasjon](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"></xref> that represents the current automatic deserialization level.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"> </xref> som representerer gjeldende automatisk deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object or graph of objects with the specified root to the given <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Serializes et objekt eller diagrammet objekter med den angitte roten til den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.
trans-unit.target: Tidsområdet objekter er serialisert i henhold til ISO 8601:1998 delen 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.

trans-unit.source: The stream onto which the formatter puts the data to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som setter formateringen dataene for å serialisere.

trans-unit.source: The object, or root of the object graph, to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Objektet eller roten for å serialisere diagrammet objektet.

trans-unit.source: All child objects of this root object are automatically serialized.
trans-unit.target: Alle underordnede objekter av denne rotobjekt er automatisk serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: serializationStream is .
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamis .

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object or graph of objects with the specified root to the given <xref:System.IO.Stream> in the SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC) format.
trans-unit.target: Serializes et objekt eller diagrammet objekter med den angitte roten til den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>formatet SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC).</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Headers are used only for specific remoting applications.
trans-unit.target: Overskrifter brukes bare for bestemte ekstern kommunikasjon programmer.

trans-unit.source: TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.
trans-unit.target: Tidsområdet objekter er serialisert i henhold til ISO 8601:1998 delen 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.

trans-unit.source: The stream onto which the formatter puts the data to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som setter formateringen dataene for å serialisere.

trans-unit.source: The object or root of the object graph to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Objektet eller roten av objektet diagrammet til å serialisere.

trans-unit.source: All child objects of this root object are automatically serialized.
trans-unit.target: Alle underordnede objekter av denne rotobjekt er automatisk serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: Remoting headers to include in the serialization.
trans-unit.target: Ekstern kommunikasjon overskrifter inkludere i serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: serializationStream is .
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"></xref> that controls type substitution during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"> </xref> Kontroller typen erstatning under serialisering og deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: Used by <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting> to generate <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> instances for <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting>til å generere <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>forekomster <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>objekter.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"></xref> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"></xref> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage"></xref> into which the SOAP top object is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage"> </xref> på det øverste SOAP-objektet er deserialiseres.

trans-unit.source: This property is used for SOAP remote procedure call (RPC) format and specifies that the SOAP top record is a method called remotely, not a common language runtime object type.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til SOAP remote procedure call (RPC) format, og angir den øverste SOAP-posten er en metode som kalles eksternt, ikke en common language runtime objekttype.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage"></xref> into which the SOAP top object is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage"> </xref> på det øverste SOAP-objektet er deserialiseres.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format in which type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir formatet som typen beskrivelser plasseres i serialisert dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: The format in which type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: Formatet i hvilken type beskrivelser plasseres i serialisert dataflyt.
